data.text: 💡𝗧𝗜𝗣𝗦 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮 𝗳𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗰𝗵𝗲𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗻𝘆 𝗼𝗯𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲𝘀🎯 As we are heading well into 2024, it is a great time to assess whether your financial strategy and accompanying financing structure is robust enough to obtain both your company’s short- and long-term objectives. What should you focus on? A few key points to keep in mind when crafting your company’s financial structure and strategy: ARE YOUR FINANCIAL GOALS IN LINE WITH YOUR 2024 OBJECTIVES? 📈 Are you currently defining your objectives for the second half of 2024? Do you have the necessary financial resources to achieve your goals? 𝗖𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗿 𝗼𝗯𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲𝘀 help guide a company's strategy in the right direction in terms of financing. DO YOU ACCOUNT FOR DIVERSIFICATION? 🔄 𝗗𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗶𝘀 𝗰𝗿𝘂𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗶𝗻 𝗯𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀, whether it's diversification of financing (see our article on diversification of financing), investments or activities. 𝗗𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗿𝗲𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗲𝘀 𝗿𝗶𝘀𝗸. Don't put all your eggs in one basket. ARE YOU UP TO SPEED WITH CURRENT MARKET TRENDS? 📊 It's highly instrumental to stay up-to-date and well-informed about financial and economic trends. 𝗔 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹-𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝗱𝘃𝗶𝘀𝗼𝗿 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝗮𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘀𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗯𝗼𝗮𝗿𝗱. However, keep in mind that market expectations are always on the move, on which we will further elaborate in the upcoming article on hedging strategies. ARE YOU PREPARED FOR THE UNEXPECTED? 💥 𝗜𝘁'𝘀 𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝘁𝗼 𝗯𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘆 𝗶𝗻 𝗰𝗮𝘀𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝘂𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗲𝗻 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀. Is your cash flow strong enough to support you in case of trouble? Are you financially prepared to seize a market opportunity if it comes your way? IS ADAPTABILITY PART OF YOUR VALUES? 🔄 At Ernest, adaptability is at the core of our values. We understand that a strategy isn't carved in stone. It must be reviewed over time and in response to changes within the company. 𝗙𝗹𝗲𝘅𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗸𝗲𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗱𝗮𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗳𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗲𝗻𝘃𝗶𝗿𝗼𝗻𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁. DO YOU EVALUATE YOUR CURRENT SITUATION? 🧮 Did you assess your current financial situation? Are your funding sources well diversified? Do you have the right balance between short and long-term lines? Are your generated cash flows sufficient to cover financial objectives and reimburse your loans? Remember that 𝗳𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱/𝗼𝗿 𝗻𝗲𝗴𝗼𝘁𝗶𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘃𝗮𝗿𝗶𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗵𝗼𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗻𝗼𝘁 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗻𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁. 📲 To help you evaluate your current situation and to negotiate your current conditions or attract new tailored financing, find your way and feel free to call on Ernest. www.ernestpartners.eu
